tool_description: Analyzes historical price patterns and volatility regimes to establish baseline metrics and identify anomalous periods for context.

start_date.description: Analysis start date in ISO 8601 format

end_date.description: Analysis end date in ISO 8601 format

regime_detection.description: Whether to perform volatility regime detection

percentile_levels.description: Percentile levels for volatility distribution analysis

correlation_analysis.description: Whether to include correlation analysis for multiple symbols

error_messages: Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date.
Date format error: Dates must be in valid ISO 8601 format.
Insufficient historical data: Not enough data available for the specified period.
Invalid percentile values: Percentile values must be between 0 and 100.
Symbols not found: One or more ticker symbols are not recognized.
usage: Provide symbols, start_date, and end_date. Optionally enable regime_detection, specify percentile_levels, and enable correlation_analysis.

average_volatility.description: Average volatility over the analysis period

analysis_summary.description: Summary of key findings from historical analysis
